narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Preparatory Rehabilitation for Individual Development & Employment, in is a Custodial Care Facility, Adult Care Home provider based in Taunton, MA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $16.8M in Medicaid payments across 252K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $16.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
